creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: large rectangular building with three circular doorways on lower level of center section; circular windows on each side of front; green accents; green masque above doorway; "MCMXXI" at top of rear section of building; terraces  on top of first level; "COMEDIE" on railing of right terrace; "TRAGEDIE" on left terrace railing
